title: MD
biography: Hilary Koprowski was a Polish virologist and immunologist active in the United States who demonstrated the world's first effective live polio vaccine. He authored or co-authored over 875 scientific papers and co-edited several scientific journals.
aiSummary: Hilary Koprowski is a virology specialist with an H-index of 120 at Wistar Institute (Member). Has been published in Somatic Cell and Molecular Genetics, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
